description:
Note for a official Grafana MongoDB plugin, please view:
https://grafana.com/grafana/plugins/grafana-mongodb-datasource

This is a MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. 
Works well with https://github.com/dcu/mongodb_exporter

If you have the node_exporter running on the mongo instance, you will also get some useful alert panels related to disk io and cpu.

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

panels.description: See which node is currently acting as the primary, secondary, ...
panels.title: Member State

title: MongoDB
